statements: SELECT * FROM player_progression WHERE player_id = 1;

SELECT player_name, equipment_name, reward_name FROM player_progression JOIN equipment_inventory ON player_progression.player_id = equipment_inventory.player_id JOIN rewards ON equipment_inventory.player_id = rewards.quest_id WHERE player_progression.level >= 10;

SELECT player_name, quest_name, reward FROM player_progression JOIN player_quest ON player_progression.player_id = player_quest.player_id JOIN quest_completion ON player_quest.quest_id = quest_completion.quest_id;
